This may just be me and a few other people but in my personal opinion i believe that going on the waterfall should be a slayable/kickable offense. Yes everyone can get up there but going up there leaves u 100% vulnerable to die and its using glitching/exploiting to get up there. Also while up on it u can snipe easily but barely be sniped.

Would love to see what other people want to say about this, mainly hoping Gash/Ben look at this tho.
